School.english: 1. I love going to school.
School.italian: Amo andare a scuola.
School.spanish: Me encanta ir a la escuela.
School.german: Ich liebe es, zur Schule zu gehen.

School.english: 2. My favorite subject is math.
School.italian: La mia materia preferita è matematica.
School.spanish: Mi asignatura favorita es matemáticas.
School.german: Mein Lieblingsfach ist Mathe.

School.english: 3. The teacher is very strict.
School.italian: Il professore è molto severo.
School.spanish: El profesor es muy estricto.
School.german: Der Lehrer ist sehr streng.

School.english: 4. We have a test tomorrow.
School.italian: Domani abbiamo un test.
School.spanish: Mañana tenemos un examen.
School.german: Morgen haben wir einen Test.

School.english: 5. I need to study for my English exam.
School.italian: Devo studiare per l'esame di inglese.
School.spanish: Necesito estudiar para mi examen de inglés.
School.german: Ich muss für meine Englischprüfung lernen.

School.english: 6. The school bus is always late.
School.italian: L'autobus scolastico è sempre in ritardo.
School.spanish: El autobús escolar siempre llega tarde.
School.german: Der Schulbus kommt immer zu spät.

School.english: 7. I forgot my homework at home.
School.italian: Ho dimenticato i compiti a casa.
School.spanish: Olvidé mis deberes en casa.
School.german: Ich habe meine Hausaufgaben zu Hause vergessen.

School.english: 8. We have a field trip next week.
School.italian: Abbiamo una gita scolastica la settimana prossima.
School.spanish: Tenemos una excursión la próxima semana.
School.german: Wir haben nächste Woche einen Schulausflug.

School.english: 9. I enjoy playing sports during recess.
School.italian: Mi piace giocare a sport durante la ricreazione.
School.spanish: Disfruto jugar deportes durante el recreo.
School.german: Ich spiele gerne Sport während der Pause.

School.english: 10. The school cafeteria serves delicious food.
School.italian: La mensa scolastica serve cibo delizioso.
School.spanish: La cafetería escolar sirve comida deliciosa.
School.german: Die Schulkantine serviert leckeres Essen.

School.english: 11. I have a lot of friends in my class.
School.italian: Ho molti amici nella mia classe.
School.spanish: Tengo muchos amigos en mi clase.
School.german: Ich habe viele Freunde in meiner Klasse.

School.english: 12. The school library has a wide selection of books.
School.italian: La biblioteca scolastica ha una vasta selezione di libri.
School.spanish: La biblioteca escolar tiene una amplia selección de libros.
School.german: Die Schulbibliothek hat eine große Auswahl an Büchern.

School.english: 13. The school bell just rang.
School.italian: È appena suonato la campanella della scuola.
School.spanish: Acaban de sonar la campana de la escuela.
School.german: Die Schulglocke hat gerade geläutet.

School.english: 14. I have art class on Thursdays.
School.italian: Ho lezione di arte il giovedì.
School.spanish: Tengo clase de arte los jueves.
School.german: Ich habe donnerstags Kunstunterricht.

School.english: 15. We have a school dance next month.
School.italian: Abbiamo un ballo scolastico il mese prossimo.
School.spanish: Tenemos un baile escolar el próximo mes.
School.german: Wir haben nächsten Monat einen Schulball.

School.english: 16. The school playground is a fun place to play.
School.italian: Il cortile della scuola è un posto divertente per giocare.
School.spanish: El patio de la escuela es un lugar divertido para jugar.
School.german: Der Schulhof ist ein lustiger Ort zum Spielen.

School.english: 17. I always bring my backpack to school.
School.italian: Porto sempre lo zaino a scuola.
School.spanish: Siempre llevo mi mochila al colegio.
School.german: Ich bringe immer meinen Rucksack zur Schule mit.

School.english: 18. The school year is almost over.
School.italian: L'anno scolastico è quasi finito.
School.spanish: El año escolar está casi terminando.
School.german: Das Schuljahr ist fast vorbei.

School.english: 19. I have a lot of homework tonight.
School.italian: Ho molti compiti per stasera.
School.spanish: Tengo muchas tareas para esta noche.
School.german: Ich habe heute Abend viele Hausaufgaben.

School.english: 20. I'm excited for summer break.
School.italian: Sono eccitato per le vacanze estive.
School.spanish: Estoy emocionado por las vacaciones de verano.
School.german: Ich freue mich auf die Sommerferien.
